TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public MustInherit Class FileDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class FileDialog abstract : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

summary.span: 显示一个用户可从中选择文件的对话框窗口。

span.span: Displays a dialog box from which the user can select a file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是一个抽象类包含常见行为和类。 is an abstract class that contains common behavior for the and classes. 它不应直接使用，但包含这两个类的通用行为。It is not intended to be used directly but contains common behavior for those two classes. 无法创建的实例。You cannot create an instance of . 尽管类声明为公共的但你不能从它继承，因为它包含内部抽象方法。Although the class is declared public, you cannot inherit from it, as it contains internal abstract methods. 若要创建一个对话框，选择或保存的文件，使用或。To create a dialog box to select or save a file, use or . 是一个模式对话框;因此，在显示时，它将阻止应用程序的其余部分之前用户已选择一个文件。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a file. 有模式地显示一个对话框，不需要输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 可以在对话框中的对象进行除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭 （通常以响应某些用户执行任何操作） 之前调用程序的输入对话框中可能发生。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用的类派生自，如和，避免使用包含绝对路径的字符串。When you use classes derived from , such as and , avoid using string literals containing absolute paths. 相反，动态获取路径中使用一个或多个下表中所述的技术。Instead, dynamically obtain the path using one or more of the techniques described in the following table. 如果你想要使用户能够选择而不是文件的文件夹，请使用。If you want to enable users to select a folder instead of a file, use the . 根据应用程序、 数据与应用程序关联的存储方式和访问文件系统的原因的类型，有许多可能的方法可以在其中创建目录路径。Depending upon the type of application, how data associated with the application is stored, and the reason for accessing the file system, there are many possible ways in which you can create a directory path. 下表显示用于动态创建的路径的技术。The following table shows the techniques for creating paths dynamically. |路径或程序类别Path or program category|类和成员，以使用Class and members to use| |------------------------------|------------------------------| |标准 Windows 路径，如 Program Files、 我的文档、 桌面和等等Standard Windows paths, such as Program Files, MyDocuments, the Desktop and so on|类是完整地获取对于这些数据，不论是通过其静态方法，如，或通过方法，使用之一枚举值。The class is the most complete source for these, either through its static methods, such as , or through the method, using one of the enumerated values.| |与当前的应用程序相关的路径Paths related to the current application|类具有静态成员，以获取某些路径，如， ， ，和。The class has static members to obtain certain paths, such as , , , and .

方法返回临时文件夹的路径。The method of the returns the path of the temporary folder.

方法类返回应用程序的当前正在执行目录。The method of the class returns the application's current executing directory.

属性类表示指定的驱动器的根目录。The property of the class represents the specified drive's root directory.| |存储为应用程序设置的路径Paths stored as application settings|访问对应的应用程序设置属性的包装类派生自。Access the corresponding applications settings property of the wrapper class derived from . 有关详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置 Windows 窗体](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md).| |注册表存储Registry storage|某些应用程序存储在注册表中的目录信息。Some applications store directory information in the registry. 类具有和属性解析为值。The class has the and properties that resolve to a value.| |ClickOnce 应用程序ClickOnce applications|为 ClickOnce 应用程序使用类成员，如，这将返回一个指向 ClickOnce 数据目录。For ClickOnce applications, use class members such as , which will return a pointer to the ClickOnce data directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d).| |国际应用程序International applications|对于国际应用程序，检索的相对路径部分从你的应用程序中的字符串资源使用类。For international applications, retrieve the relative path portion from a string resource in your application by using the class. 有关全球化和本地化的详细信息，请参阅主题[全球化和本地化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md)。For more information about globalization and localization, see the topic [Globalization and Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md).| 请注意，可能需要使用一个或多个所介绍的技术来生成完整的路径。Notice that a full path may be built up using one or more of the described techniques. 例如，方法可能用于获取的路径的我的文档文件夹中，则添加相对子目录部分可能用于应用程序设置。For example, the method might be used to obtain the path to the MyDocuments folder, then an application setting may be used to add a relative subdirectory portion. 类包含静态成员，以帮助操作绝对和相对路径字符串，而和类具有实际分别操作文件和目录的静态成员。The class contains static members to assist in manipulating absolute and relative path strings, whereas the and classes have static members that actually manipulate files and directories, respectively. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你的应用程序的用户更改中的文件夹，则你的应用程序的当前工作目录设置中指定的位置为。If the user of your application changes the folder in the , then the current working directory for your application is set to the location specified in the . 若要防止此情况，将设置属性`true`。To prevent this, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用实现并说明了创建、 设置的属性，以及显示的对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用方法以显示对话框中，并返回。The example uses the method to display the dialog box and return the . 该示例需要的窗体具有在其上放置和命名空间添加到它。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AddExtension { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AddExtension : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果用户省略扩展名，对话框是否自动在文件名中添加扩展名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box automatically adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension.

value.span: 当用户省略了扩展名时，如果对话框在文件名中添加扩展名，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the dialog box adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到文件名的扩展名取决于当前所选的文件筛选器和的值属性。The extension added to a file name depends on the currently selected file filter and the value of the property. 如果属性是`true`，对话框中添加第一个扩展插件从现有文件匹配的当前文件筛选器。If the property is `true`, the dialog box adds the first extension from the current file filter that matches an existing file. 如果没有匹配的文件当前文件筛选器，则对话框将添加指定的扩展属性。If no files match the current file filter, the dialog box adds the extension specified in the property. 如果属性是`false`，对话框中将当前文件筛选器中添加的第一个有效的文件扩展名。If the property is `false`, the dialog box adds the first valid file name extension from the current file filter. 如果当前文件筛选器包含没有有效的文件扩展名，对话框中添加指定的扩展属性。If the current file filter contains no valid file name extensions, the dialog box adds the extension specified in the property.

permission.span: 有关添加扩展，如果用户省略它。

span.span: for adding an extension if the user omits it.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoUpgradeEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoUpgradeEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 实例在 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 上运行时是否应自动升级外观和行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance should automatically upgrade appearance and behavior when running on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

value.span: 如果此实例应自动升级外观和行为上运行时 [！INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)];否则为。

span.span: if this instance should automatically upgrade appearance and behavior when running on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`、类将具有[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]-上样式的外观和行为[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]。If this property is `false`, the class will have a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]-style appearance and behavior on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]. 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]，此属性不起任何作用。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], this property does not have any effect.

value.span: 当用户指定不存在的文件名时，如果对话框显示警告，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the dialog box displays a warning if the user specifies a file name that does not exist; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是`true`; 对继承和`false`; 对继承。The default value is `true` for an inheriting and `false` for an inheriting .

permission.span: 如果该文件已存在，则显示一条警告。

span.span: to display a warning if the file already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]，此属性不起任何作用。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], this property does not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeDialogAndButton`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultExt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultExt : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置默认文件扩展名。

span.span: Gets or sets the default file name extension.

value.span: 默认的文件扩展名。

span.span: The default file name extension.

value.span: 返回的字符串不包含句点。

span.span: The returned string does not include the period.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序在用户指定不带扩展名的文件名称时向文件名追加一个扩展。When the user of your application specifies a file name without an extension, the appends an extension to the file name. 使用扩展由和属性。The extension that is used is determined by the and properties. 如果选择中的筛选器和筛选器指定的扩展，然后使用该扩展名。If a filter is selected in the and the filter specifies an extension, then that extension is used. 如果选定的筛选器使用通配符代替该扩展，则在指定的扩展名使用属性。If the filter selected uses a wildcard in place of the extension, then the extension specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和与流的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示如何使用， ， ，和成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是已准备好运行时将其复制到你的项目的完整示例。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/VB/form1.vb#1)]

member this.FileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个包含在文件对话框中选定的文件名的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing the file name selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 对话框中选择的文件名。

span.span: The file name selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件名中包括的文件路径和扩展插件。The file name includes both the file path and the extension. 如果未不选择任何文件，此方法将返回空字符串 ("")。If no files are selected, this method returns an empty string (""). 在从使用时类，此属性表示保存; 当中使用的文件类，它表示所打开的文件。When used from the class, this property represents the file being saved; when used from the class, it represents the file being opened. 此属性只能为一个所选文件的名称。This property can only be the name of one selected file. 如果你想要返回包含在多选对话框中，使用的所有选定文件的名称的数组。If you want to return an array containing the names of all selected files in a multiple-selection dialog box, use . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和与流的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示如何使用， ， ，和成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是已准备好运行时将其复制到你的项目的完整示例。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 要获取或设置的文件名称。

span.span: to get or set the file name.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileNames As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ FileNames { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对话框中所有选定文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

value.span: 包含对话框中所有选定文件的文件名的 类型数组。

span.span: An array of type , containing the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个文件名中包括的文件路径和扩展插件。Each file name includes both the file path and the extension. 如果未不选择任何文件，此方法将返回空数组。If no files are selected, this method returns an empty array. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户选择多个映像，并将其显示在窗体上的控件。The following code example allows the user to select a number of images and display them in controls on a Form. 它演示如何初始化，则设置和属性，并允许用户选择多个文件，通过设置属性为 true。It demonstrates initializing an , setting the and properties, and allowing the user to select multiple files by setting the property to true. 此代码示例假定你的窗体已有控件名为`openFileDialog1`、名为`SelectFileButton`，和一个名为`flowLayoutPanel1`。This code example assumes that your form already has an control named `openFileDialog1`, a named `SelectFileButton`, and a named `flowLayoutPanel1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: to get the file names.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FileOk As CancelEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户单击文件对话框中的“打开”或“保存”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on the **Open** or **Save** button on a file dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，如何处理事件以及如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the property, handling the event and using the method. 该示例运行时，用户可选择从图形文件对象。When the example runs, a user can select graphics files from an object. 所选的文件将显示在窗体中。The selected files are displayed in the form. 方法会强行重绘的每个图形文件在打开的窗体。The method forces a repaint of the form for each graphics file opened. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中一个窗体包含名为`PictureBox1`、名为`OpenFileDialog1`，和一个名为`fileButton`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `PictureBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, and a named `fileButton`. 调用`InitializePictureBox`和`InitializeOpenFileDialog`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializePictureBox` and `InitializeOpenFileDialog` methods from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 当运行示例时，显示对话框中单击的按钮。When the example is running, display the dialog box by clicking the button. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Filter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件名筛选器字符串，该字符串决定对话框的“另存为文件类型”或“文件类型”框中出现的选择内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the current file name filter string, which determines the choices that appear in the "Save as file type" or "Files of type" box in the dialog box.

value.span: 对话框中可用的文件筛选选项。

span.span: The file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每个筛选选项，筛选器字符串都包含筛选器，跟垂直条说明 (|) 和筛选器模式。For each filtering option, the filter string contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 由竖线分隔的字符串不同筛选选项。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是筛选器字符串的示例：The following is an example of a filter string: `Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*` 你可以将多个筛选器模式添加到筛选器，例如用分号分隔的文件类型：You can add several filter patterns to a filter by separating the file types with semicolons, for example: `Image Files(*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF)|*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF|All files (*.*)|*.*` 使用属性以设置的筛选选项向用户显示第一个。Use the property to set which filtering option is shown first to the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用实现并说明了创建、 设置的属性，以及显示的对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用和属性，可为用户提供筛选器的列表。The example uses the and properties to provide a list of filters for the user. 该示例需要的窗体具有在其上放置和命名空间添加到它。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: format is invalid.

member this.FilterIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框中当前选定筛选器的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 包含文件对话框中当前选定筛选器的索引的值。

span.span: A value containing the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以设置的筛选选项向用户显示第一个。Use the property to set which filtering option is shown first to the user. 你还可以使用的值后显示文件对话框以执行特殊文件操作取决于选择的筛选器。You can also use the value of after showing the file dialog to perform special file operations depending upon the filter chosen. > [!NOTE] > 第一个筛选器项的索引值为 1。The index value of the first filter entry is 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用实现并说明了创建、 设置的属性，以及显示的对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用和属性，可为用户提供筛选器的列表。The example uses the and properties to provide a list of filters for the user. 该示例需要的窗体具有在其上放置和命名空间添加到它。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr HookProc (IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);

span.span: The handle to the dialog box window.
The message received by the dialog box.
Additional information about the message.
Additional information about the message.

summary.span: 定义要重写的通用对话框挂钩过程，以便向文件对话框添加特定功能。

span.span: Defines the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to the file dialog box.

returns.span: 如果默认对话框过程处理此消息，则返回零；如果默认对话框过程忽略此消息，则返回非零值。

span.span: Returns zero if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; returns a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 挂钩过程允许用户连接或插入其他例程的例程或应用程序，以便调试或增强功能。A hook procedure allows the user to connect or insert other routines into a routine or application for the purpose of debugging or enhancing functionality. 默认情况下，挂钩过程中心 WM_INITDIALOG 消息响应中的屏幕上的对话框。By default, the hook procedure centers the dialog box on the screen in response to a WM_INITDIALOG message.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InitialDirectory { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.InitialDirectory : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框显示的初始目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

value.span: 文件对话框中显示的初始目录。

span.span: The initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常使用以下源之一设置：The property is typically set using one of the following sources: - 在程序中，从最后一个目录或文件操作可能保留以前使用的路径。A path that was previously used in the program, perhaps retained from the last directory or file operation. - 从持久性的源，如应用程序设置，读取的路径或应用程序中的字符串资源。A path read from a persistent source, such as an application setting, a or a string resource in the application. - 标准 Windows 系统和用户的路径，例如 Program Files、 我的文档、 我，等 (其中你可以获取使用方法)Standard Windows system and user paths, such as Program Files, MyDocuments, MyMusic, and so on (which you can obtain using the method) - 当前应用程序，如其启动目录相关的路径 (你可以获取使用属性上对象)。A path related to the current application, such as its startup directory (which you can obtain using properties on the object). 有关创建动态路径的详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information about creating dynamic paths, see the class overview. 上[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]，如果设置为而不仅是目录路径不是一个完整的文件名称，，到应用程序的路径，或从其用户最近一次选择一个文件的目录将默认的初始目录。On [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)], if is set to a full file name instead of just a directory path, the initial directory will default either to the application path, or to the directory from which the user last selected a file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用实现并说明了创建、 设置的属性，以及显示的对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用属性来设置时向用户显示该对话框是什么的初始目录。The example uses the property to set what the initial directory is when the dialog box is displayed to the user. 该示例需要的窗体具有在其上放置和命名空间添加到它。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SupportMultiDottedExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SupportMultiDottedExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对话框是否支持显示和保存具有多个文件扩展名的文件。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the dialog box supports displaying and saving files that have multiple file name extensions.

value.span: 如果对话框支持多个文件扩展名，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box supports multiple file name extensions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时用户必须打开和保存使用多个文件扩展名的文件。Sometimes users must open and save files that use multiple file name extensions. 例如，应用程序清单使用的文件[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]复杂的文件名称扩展中的部署技术结束日期"。 exe.manifest"。For example, the application manifest files used by the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment technology end in the complex file name extension ".exe.manifest". 此属性设置为`true`使你能够设置多点扩展的属性。Setting this property to `true` enables you to set the property to a multi-dotted extension. 如果是`false`，并将分配的多点扩展，如派生控件将只使用在字符串中的最后一个扩展。If is `false`, and you assign a multi-dotted extension to , derived controls such as will only use the last extension in the string. 例如，".manifest"将使用而不是"。 exe.manifest"。For example, ".manifest" will be used instead of ".exe.manifest". ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文件扩展名保存"。 data.txt"。The following code example saves files with the extension ".data.txt". 此代码示例要求你的应用程序主机名为`saveFileDialog1`和名为`button1`。This code example requires that your application host a named `saveFileDialog1` and a named `button1`. [!code-csharp[SupportMultiDottedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SupportMultiDottedExtensions/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SupportMultiDottedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SupportMultiDottedExtensions/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the file dialog box title.

value.span: 文件对话框标题。

span.span: The file dialog box title.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字符串放置在对话框中的标题栏中。The string is placed in the title bar of the dialog box. 如果标题是空字符串，系统将使用默认标题，即"另存为"打开"。If the title is an empty string, the system uses a default title, which is either "Save As" or "Open". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化，则设置和属性，并允许用户选择多个文件，通过设置属性为 true。The following code example demonstrates initializing an , setting the and properties, and allowing the user to select multiple files by setting the property to true. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中一个窗体包含名为`OpenFileDialog1`和名为`fileButton`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form containing an named `OpenFileDialog1` and a named `fileButton`. 调用`InitializeOpenFileDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeOpenFileDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 该示例还要求`Click`事件`Button`控件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example also requires that the `Click` event of the `Button` control is connected to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果编辑控件包含任何内容，但空间当用户单击**确定**，对话框中返回的文件名，是否这是否是有效。If the edit control contains anything but spaces when the user clicks **OK**, the dialog box returns the file name, whether it is valid or not. 没有默认扩展插件将添加到文本。No default extension is added to the text.
